contexts.context: ...Now, also the so-called Haskalahs have to <mark>admit</mark> that our ultra-orthodox brothers were right:...
...is at fault for this? We have to <mark>admit</mark>: the common Jew, the pious are also...
One has to <mark>admit</mark> that the government understood the pious Jewsâ€™ interests better...
...can break out any time, we have to <mark>admit</mark> that revolutionists can do great harm when invading Austria...
